YpSv16xAykFLDbERdmeNDQ.text: We popped in for a warm bowl of ramen on a cool and very busy night during Hogmanay.  We were fortunate to be seated right away.  The service was prompt and the ramen came out very quickly.  The food was tasty and filling - I really enjoyed the creamy curry broth in the beef tataki ramen.    Overall, it was a great place for a fast, warm meal.  It fulfills that niche quite perfectly.

photos.caption: Photo of Ramen Ramen noodle bar - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. Beef tataki ramen

9I2kUT-2zs5Bq3bvrWKGyA.text: I'm thinking the people getting excited about this ramen have never been to Japan.  All this mediocre bowl of noodles had me wishing for was instant transportation back to Tokyo for some Ichiban ramen.  Ok service.  Not a great interior.
